message.name: SELECT_ALL
message.locale: All

message.name: ERR_BANK_ACCOUNT_PROGRAM_TYPE_LINK_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The selected bank account link already exists for the program %1c.

message.name: ERR_LINK_START_DATE_BEFORE_BANK_START_DATE
message.locale: The selected start date cannot be before the bank evidence start date.

message.name: ERR_LINK_END_DATE_AFTER_BANK_END_DATE
message.locale: The selected end date cannot be after the bank evidence end date.

message.name: ERR_LINK_START_DATE_BEFORE_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The selected start date must be on or after the current date.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: The end date cannot be before the start date.

message.name: ERR_ENDING_LINK_INVALID_END_DATE_WITH_ACCOUNT_NUM
message.locale: Existing Link End date cannot be prior to Existing Link Start date.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_MODIFY_PAYMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: The start date cannot be modified. There exists a valid payment associated to this bank account.

message.name: ERR_BANK_ACCOUNT_MODIFY_PAYMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: A different bank account cannot be selected. There exists a valid payment associated to this bank account.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_MODIFY_PAYMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: The end date cannot be modified to the past. There exists a valid payment associated to this bank account.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_MODIFY_PAST_DATE
message.locale: When changing the bank account, the start date cannot be in the past.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_LINK_PAYMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: This link cannot be deleted as a payment has already been issued to the linked bank account.

message.name: ERR_NEW_LINK_OVERLAPS_EXISTING
message.locale: The new link overlaps with existing account %1s.

message.name: ERR_LINK_OVERLAPS_EXISTING
message.locale: The link overlaps with existing account %1s.

message.name: ERR_DELIVERY_PATTERN_DOES_NOT_MATCH_METHOD
message.locale: The selected delivery pattern method does not match with participant payment method type for the selected date.

message.name: ERR_NOMINEE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_DOES_NOT_MATCH_METHOD
message.locale: The nominee's delivery pattern method does not match with the participant payment method type.

message.name: ERR_NO_ACTIVE_DESTINATION_OR_ADDRESS
message.locale: No active direct deposit links or mailing addresses exist for the current date.

message.name: ERR_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, payment destination syncing for up to %2n Concern Roles will not have been processed.

message.name: INF_RECORDS_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Concern Roles processed: %1n

message.name: INF_RECORDS_SKIPPED
message.locale: Total number of Concern Roles skipped: %1n

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_DESTINATION_BATCH
message.locale: Payment Destination Batch

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_DESTINATION_BATCH_SUB
message.locale: Report from Payment Destination batch job run on %1s.

message.name: ERR_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_FOR_EFT
message.locale: Bank account must be selected for Direct Deposit delivery method.
